item.description:
Appalachian Mountain Club hike led by AMC leader Janet Kaiser. For more info on AMC hikes visit http://www.outdoors.org/

Ryder Beach in Truro.

Beach to woodland trails, hills, and scenic bay views.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Directions--Route 6, then left on Prince Valley Road to the end. Right on County Road, then an immediate left on Ryder Beach Road. Park at the end. Meet at 9:45am. 2 hours. (On map Ryder is on Bay side, furthest south.)

Breakfast at 8:15am at the Fairway Restaurant on Route 6 in North Eastham  (which was being painted the last time we visited and is next to the Hole in One Donut place.)  Donuts optional. (Street address is 4295 State Highway, North Eastham, MA)

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Thursday Hiking Club goes farther out-- Truro's Ryder Beach
